header.title: Vyas
header.subtitle: Generative AI Intern @ Inspire Softech | Skilled in LLMs, Hugging Face, Prompt Engineering, Gradio, SQL, UiPath, pandas | AICTE-Certified

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am an Aspiring AI Engineer and Applied Data Science student with a passion for developing real-world solutions. My experience includes building projects like the emotion-aware Nova AI and a precision farming system called Aerorover. I am proficient in Python, MySQL, and FastAPI, and an active contributor to tech communities. I am currently honing my skills as an intern at Inspire Softech Solution.

items.title: Nova AI
items.description: Developed and led Nova AI, a project leveraging Python and NLP to automate high-quality content generation. This initiative increased content output by 40% and significantly reduced production time, boosting user engagement.

items.title: Portfolio
items.description: This personal portfolio, built with React and TypeScript, showcases my projects, skills, and achievements in AI/ML and software development. It features a modern, responsive design with interactive elements.

items.title: StudyBuddy Pro
items.description: StudyBuddy Pro is a personal productivity and learning companion designed to help students focus, learn effectively, and stay motivated through gamification. This application features a local-first architecture, utilizing a React frontend and a Node.js Express backend with SQLite for data storage.

achievements.title: Achievements & Certifications
items: Nova AI Developer: Created a next-generation Emotional AI assistant with real-time facial emotion detection, smart data logging, and natural voice interaction.
Community Leader at CodeHackPirates: Founded a Discord community to foster collaborative learning in AI/ML and automation domains.
Google Cloud Vertex AI Skill Badge
